title: Why you must not quit the day job if you want to start a successful business
text:
Q I just quit my job to pursue a business venture. Things have been extremely slow and I’ve started to think that I may have made the wrong decision. Should I be doing better by now?

A What you need is a strong dose of reality. How thoroughly did you investigate the business idea before giving up your job? It’s wise to taste some success before risking everything on a new venture. A bit of market research and a carefully compiled business plan don’t provide the comfort that comes from practical experience.

Every enterprise must start somewhere, but instead of following an untested dream, most successful entrepreneurs develop an idea discovered during their daily routine. Boots was developed...
